SEARCH
Package org.example

Class ApartmentApplianceManager

java.lang.Object
org.example.ApartmentApplianceManager
public class ApartmentApplianceManager extends Object
Manages a collection of ElectricAppliance objects in an apartment. Provides methods for power calculation, sorting, and searching.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final List<ElectricAppliance>
    appliances
    The list holding all ElectricAppliance objects in the apartment.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ApartmentApplianceManager()
    Initializes the manager with an empty list of appliances.

  • Constructor Details

    • ApartmentApplianceManager

      public ApartmentApplianceManager()
      Initializes the manager with an empty list of appliances.

  • Method Details

    • addAppliance

      public void addAppliance(ElectricAppliance appliance)
      Adds an appliance to the apartment list.
      Parameters:
      appliance - The ElectricAppliance object to add.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the appliance object is null.

    • calculateTotalPluggedInPower

      public int calculateTotalPluggedInPower()
      Calculates the total power consumed by all appliances that are currently plugged in.
      Returns:
      The total power consumption in Watts.

    • sortByPower

      public List<ElectricAppliance> sortByPower()
      Sorts the appliances list in place based on their power consumption (ascending).
      Returns:
      The sorted list of appliances.

    • findByRadiationRange

      public List<ElectricAppliance> findByRadiationRange(double minLevel, double maxLevel)
      Finds appliances that fall within a specified range of electromagnetic radiation level.
      Parameters:
      minLevel - The minimum radiation level (inclusive).
      maxLevel - The maximum radiation level (inclusive).
      Returns:
      A list of appliances that match the radiation range.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the minimum level is greater than the maximum level or levels are negative.
      RuntimeException - if no appliances are found in the specified range.

    • getAllAppliances

      public List<ElectricAppliance> getAllAppliances()
      Gets the current list of all appliances.
      Returns:
      The list of all appliances currently managed.
